Chest X-ray.clinical: PA/LAT chest to r/o PNA, PTX, pleural eff., or cardiomegaly.
Chest X-ray.formal: Basic imaging to detect lung disease, pleural effusion, pneumothorax, or cardiomegaly.

Chest CT.clinical: CT chest (w/ or w/o contrast) to eval lung mass, PE, ILD, or mediastinal LAD.
Chest CT.formal: Cross-sectional imaging of lungs and mediastinum; used for PE, cancer, and interstitial disease.

Brain CT.clinical: Non-con HCT to r/o ICH, infarct, skull fx, or mass effect.
Brain CT.formal: Fast brain scan for hemorrhage, stroke, fracture, or mass effect in emergency settings.

Brain MRI.clinical: Brain MRI w/ and w/o gad for tumor workup, DWI/FLAIR for stroke, demyelination, or seizure eval.
Brain MRI.formal: High-resolution brain imaging for tumor, stroke, epilepsy, or demyelinating disease.

Spine MRI.clinical: MRI C/L/T/S spine for HNP, spinal stenosis, cord compression, or s/p trauma.
Spine MRI.formal: Imaging of spine for disc herniation, spinal stenosis, or cord compression.
